revised_title: Anatomy and Embryology of Ichthyosauria and Sauropterygia Shoulder Girdle
tldr: The author, J. W. Hulke, examines the structure and homologies of the shoulder girdle in Ichthyosauria and Sauropterygia, providing evidence against the existence of a precoracoid in Ichthyosauria and establishing the homology of the dorsal ray in the girdle with the shoulder blade in Testudinata and other Reptilia.
